name: ProductCatalogVersion
comment: Maintains the details of all the services, merchandise, or facilities that can be offered, sold, or purchased by the Service Provider, its competitors and other Involved Parties. Products can also include non-telecom goods and services that are of interest to the Service Provider.Examples of products include:* Apple IPhone 6 Handset* $80 My Plan Plus* Early Termination Fee* 10 Day Travel pack
vf short description: Maintains the details of all the services, merchandise, or facilities that can be offered, sold, or purchased by the Service Provider, its competitors and other Involved Parties.

column.name: ProductCatalogVersionSK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: ValidFromDate
column.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

column.name: ValidUntilDate
column.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

column.name: KeyTypeId
column.comment: Key type of record

column.name: ProductCatalogVersionKey
column.comment: Identifies the product catalog version in ALDM. Each product catalog version key value represents a unique product catalog version.

column.name: ProductCatalogVersionDesc
column.comment: Indicates the descriptive name of the product catalog item.

column.name: ProductCatalogVersionTypeSK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: ProductCategorySK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: ProductLineOfBusinessSK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: ComponentServiceTypeInd
column.comment: Indicates the service type of the component (product type indicator).

column.name: ComponentAllowSuspendFlag
column.comment: Indicates whether the component can be suspended.Values are:- 1 - Component can be suspended.- 0 - Component cannot be suspended.

column.name: OfferTypeInd
column.comment: Indicates the product offer type.

column.name: OfferStandAloneFlag
column.comment: Indicates whether the offer is a standalone product offer.Values are:- 1 - Standalone offer- 0 - Not a standalone offer

column.name: OfferCategoryInd
column.comment: Indicates the product offer category.

column.name: OfferBundleFlag
column.comment: Indicates whether the offer is a bundled product offer.Values are:- 1 - Bundled product offer- 0 - Not a bundled product offer

column.name: OfferPrepaidFlag
column.comment: Indicates whether the offer is applicable only for prepaid connections.Values are:- 1 - Prepaid only offer- 0 - Not a prepaid only offer

column.name: PricePlanPromoteFlag
column.comment: Indicates whether the price plan is a promotional price plan.Values are:- 1 - Promotional price plan- 0 - Non-promotional price plan

column.name: PricePlanPromotionDuration
column.comment: Specifies the duration of the promotional price plan. For example, 3, which implies that the promotional price plan is applicable for 3 months.

column.name: PricePlanPromotionInterval
column.comment: Interval of the promotional price plan duration.For example:M - MonthsD - Days

column.name: PricePlanPromotionEndDate
column.comment: Indicates the sate on which promotional price plan will expire.

column.name: PricePlanTypeInd
column.comment: Indicates the price plan type.

column.name: ProductCatalogSourceId
column.comment: Identifies the product catalog item in the source system.

column.name: BusinessProductTypeInd
column.comment: Identifies the business product type of the product catalog item.

column.name: ClassificationComponentSK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: GeneratesSubscriptionFlag
column.comment: Indicates whether the product generates subscription.Values are:- 1 - Yes- 0 - No

column.name: SellableFlag
column.comment: Indicates whether the product can be sold.Values are:- 1 - Yes- 0 - No

column.name: ProductCatalogSourceVersionId
column.comment: Indicates the version identifer of the product catalog item within the source system.

column.name: ProductCatalogSK
column.comment: Surrogate key of the object

column.name: SourceSystemId
column.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

column.name: DeleteIndicator
column.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

column.name: RowUpdateTime
column.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

column.name: SourceUpdateTime
column.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

column.name: SourceQueryTime
column.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

column.name: DptiId
column.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

column.name: PTime
column.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

column.name: Insert_Load_Id
column.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

column.name: Update_Load_Id
column.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
